name: Retropath Hardcore Edition
description:
Retropath takes place in the castle dungeon of the conquer of the land. Playing as Valient, the rogue knight and last remaining knight alive, players must search the ever shifting dungeon to take on the self proclaimed psychopath  ruler of Retronia. All the other knights have been slain, and in effort to avoid being hunted down, Valient has ventured forth into the castle to free the land and confront... the Retropath.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move, Space to Jump, Shift to pause.
